湴字的基本解释

湴
bàn
烂泥：“人多不晓湴河之义。”

湴
pán
蹚水过河。
在烂泥中行走。

湴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bàn］
［《廣韻》蒲鑑切，去鑑，並。］
亦作“埿3”。
深泥；烂泥。

湴字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　湴； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页638第21
【廣韻】蒲鑒切【集韻】薄鑑切，?音?。與埿同。深泥也。　又星命家，祿後一辰爲湴河。【夢溪筆談】湴河謂陷運，如今之空亡也。　又【集韻】皮咸切，音碰。行淖中也。

湴字的源字形

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
湴字的起名意思

暂无。

bàn

Huan

Wading across the river.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bàn］
["Guangyun" Pu Jianqie, go to Jian, and merge. ]
Also known as "埿3".
Deep mud; mud.
Huan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　湴; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 638 21
[Guang Yun] Pu Jianqi [Ji Yun] Bo Jianqi, "Yin". Same as the old. Deep mud also.　Xing Mingjia again, Huanhe for the first hour after Lu. [Mengxi Binar] Huanhe is said to have fallen fortune, and it is now empty.　[Jiyun] The skin is salted and cut, and the sound is touched. Xing Nao Zhong also.
Huan
